PUNISHMENT has had its scaling adjusted. Its the same as previously at two afflictions or lower, but adds more for each affliction after that point.
RELENTLESS now reduces your chance to be impacted by the STUPIDITY affliction.
VIVISECT now bypasses STARBURST.
BLOODLUST can now push you above maximum health and mana when it fires, up to a cap of 150% of your max.

ANGUISH has been made better to reflect its placement in the skill. In addition to its previous functionality, it now also causes you to retain the majority of your defences (and hellforgings) upon starbursting or similar.
All mounts and other loyals are moved to the APOTHEOSIS challenge room upon a duel concluding in the special arena.
You may now maintain up to two hellforge bonuses on your armour at once.
AGONY is now an always on effect on a hellforged weapon, you no longer need to give up other investments to use it.
AGONY no longer fires if you have no afflictions, wasting the passive cure cooldown.
AGONY via HEALTHLEECH is now a twelve second passive cure cooldown, up from ten.
DEATHAURA damage has been reduced slightly.
PREDATOR now supports the SPHINX artefact power.
RAMPAGE now incurs a balance cost as the abfile falsely indicated it did.
The balance cost for RAMPAGE in the ability file has been reduced slightly.
There is now a message when TORMENT gives healthleech. As a result, the message to the target receiving healthleech from this ability has changed.
Untargeted ARC now accepts inline hellforge weapon investments.

Pervasion.text: PURIFY is now blocked by weariness.
WRECK changed to give STUPIDITY and RECKLESSNESS from STUPIDITY and DIZZINESS.
Sped up BLADE when targeted at denizens for the purposes of dealing damage.
The artefact power FLUVIAL_FURY has had its damage modifier increased from 5% to 7%.
DROWN can now be performed in any flooded location at its previous speed. The water level being raised or the location being underwater speed up the channel slightly.
TIDALWAVE now hits room hinders if not moving from or to a water room (flooded counts).
DOWNPOUR now does progressively less damage if cast within a small window following a previous cast. This only comes into play with multiple casters.
DOWNPOUR now incurs a longer balance when doing its maximum damage (i.e. on a fully frozen target).
TIDALWAVE now only bypasses room hinder if the current room you're moving from is flooded in some form, rather than if the current or target one is.
DOWNPOUR must now be the first attack in a flux - it can still be comboed, but it can never be the second attack of the two.
DOWNPOUR no longer prones an unprone target.
TSUNAMI now has a flat balance amount added on to the scaling room amount to bring it more in line with other beckons.

Pestilence.text: VIRULENCE has been reworked somewhat. This was always intended as the lock threat but its proving too punishing a fork as it stands. It now requires the target be exposed to be used, and always requires and consumes balance/equilibrium (basically its a standalone cast now rather than something you can combo with a plague/trace if you hold your expose in reserve).
VIRULENCE no longer requires exposure, just balance/eq.
EXTRACT now strips shield if one is present instead of conveying the plague on the burrowed swarm. If there is no shield, it conveys the plague as before.
WEARINESS now serves as clumsiness-style hinder for pestilence attacks.
WEARINESS has had its hinder rate against pestilence reduced.
WEARINESS no longer stops pestilence attacks against a target suffering from a prone state (entangled, paralysed, etc).

SACRIFICE now ticks multiple times (once for every 500 insects over 1000 consumed in the swarm). Each subsequent tick does less damage and no plague, but it should be a much more worthwhile AoE move now. Numbers may prove to be a little conservative, I'll keep an eye on it. It won't tick more than 3 extra times, so don't go and blow your entire insect stash on it.
WEARINESS now only impacts STING and INFEST from the skill.
Added SWARM DISBAND to wipe one of your swarms.
Added SWARM DISMISS <RESERVES <insect type> to have saner ways to get rid of unwanted insects.
LATENCY no longer can refresh itself. It still overrides other immunity blockers.
Swarm abilities are now hindered by clumsiness instead of weariness. First and third person messages have changed in the event of a failure.

Physiology.text: EVALUATE without the partial specifier now has an internal cooldown of 1 second rather than an equilibrium cost.
REAVE has been sped up at all three stages (most significantly at the all 4 tempers stage).
SULPHUR based homunculi will now afflict with disrupt if their attack drains someone to under 75% of maximum mana.
GERMINATE NUCLEUS is no longer a channeled action.
INUNDATE SANGUINE now bases its bleeding off of maximum mana rather than health when the target has been CORRUPTED via HOMUNCULUS.
Alchemists can now CULTIVATE NUCLEUS outside of a lab.
REAVEs balance time now scales to count of humours similar to completion time.
REVIVIFICATION will now pull salt from the rift if there is insufficient quantities in the inventory to perform the ability.
INUNDATE SANGUINE is now very significantly reduced bleeding below 5 stacks of the humour. Once it reaches above this threshold it applies as previously for all stacks.
TORSO now fires on elevation changes such as flight along with standard movement attempts.

Pranks.text: You may no longer set the TIMERS on bombs while prone.
The clouds produced by SMOKEBOMBS now function correctly.
The periodic tick of ITCHPOWDER now more consistently takes place.
You can no longer deliver timed bombs to pets by means of THROW TO.
BOP now scales with strength when targeted at denizens.
When you STRAP a bomb to a mouse, the command will skip over mice that already have a bomb attached if you do not specify a numeric ID.
SLIPPERINESS now provides a small amount of damage mitigation vs adventurers, though it is less than the one it grants against denizen sourced damage.
BADJOKE now also drops denizen shields.
The clouds made by SMOKEBOMBS will now always work regardless of how the smokebomb was detonated.
The first tick on a person for ITCHING will now not occur for at least 2 seconds.
You are now notified when a bomb carried by a SUICIDE MOUSE explodes.

JUGGLING now has the built in accuracy bonus of the THROWING weaponry skill. These two bonuses do not stack, this serves only to make jesters not have to invest into weaponry heavily for basic functionality.
New ability: LIBERATE.
New ability: VENT.
THROWing bombs through either a FIREWALL or THORNWALL will now cause the bomb to detonate in the throwers room rather than the adjacent one.
MICE/MOUSELIST/MICELIST has been added to the SUICIDEMICE ability.
TIMERS have had their inaccuracy made less extreme.
You can now perform balloon related actions while selfish. More changes to come here for other cases, but they are much more involved.
In case for some reason this impacts you, quitting now unjuggles your items.
Inlining envenoming works with the above (so THROW JUGGLED AT MAKARIOS CURARE for example).
There has been a major rewrite to juggling, so if you see anything odd, please let me know.

You may now THROW JUGGLED, or THROW JUGGLED<#> to throw a juggled item. If throwing without a number specified you will throw in the order you started juggling your items, if specifying a number you will specify that position in the list of items you started juggling. Examples:
ITCHPOWDER is now a person specific timer rather than a global tick.
ITCHPOWDER's first tick now always gives impatience. Subsequent ticks are still rng based, but this should make it more reliable to plan around in executions.
Obscure issues where you could not multijuggle certain items by specific syntaxes have been resolved.
JUGGLED daggers now return to your hands (though are unjuggled in the process) when you throw them at someone in your location.
The SHIELD defence is now a +1 for GALLOWSHUMOUR.

Priest general.text: INQUISITION is no longer a timed affliction.
INQUISITION now has alternate cure conditions: it instantly heals once you do not have PRONE, GUILT, and SPIRITBURN.
The blurb for the INQUISITION affliction has been updated (for AFFLICTION SHOW and similar).

Propagation.text: PROPAGATE has had its cooldown reduced.
PROPAGATE is no longer an aggressive action.
When in VIRIDIAN form, Sylvan's gain access to ENVENOM natively.
Inlining envenoming for THORNREND will now always work in retardation.

HEARTSEED has had its instakill timer sped up by one second. This one second is shaved off of the first tick rather than being spread across all stages: this is by design as I don't want this to particularly improve strategies where the heartseed delivery was concealed, so that will be revealed slightly sooner in exchange for a more consistent and potent finisher.
You can now ASSUME VIRIDIAN in watery locations.
VINEWREATHE has had its equilibrium time reduced and duration increased.
Forest enemies can no longer assume the VIRIDIAN.

Curing HEARTSEED now clears all torso damage you possess. It does not clear mild/serious internal trauma - the goal of this change is to make the Sylvan have to commit to their execution like other prep based classes, and not hold the torso damage until things go right.
LACERATED THROAT now contributes towards the damage formula on a heartseed cure more than other afflictions.
The willpower cost of THORNREND has been reduced against denizens.
Propagated SKULLCAP has had its arm bonus changed to make thornrends generate some arcane power on a target who you have feedback on, so long as an arcane storm is present in the room.
The VIRIDIAN transformation sequence has been sped up somewhat.

Psionics.text: MANIPULATE is now blocked by the CONFUSION affliction.
TRANSCEND now charges when fighting denizens. We may have to adjust the rate here to be separate to the one for players, its something I'll monitor.
You can now PSI UNLINK when at full health and mana to break an active psionic link. This incurs a substantial equilibrium cost.
You can now DESTROY your own projections remotely. This is a channeled action.
Durations of VANISH have been increased slightly. Ten additional seconds for partial, five for total.
You can no longer PSI MANIPULATE the use of GEMS OF NEGATION.
PARTIAL VANISH has had its duration increased to 80 seconds: as a result TOTAL VANISH has been increased to 40 seconds.

PERCEPTION will now list who is being locked by who along with the previous information. In the case where the locker has the silent_telepathy power, their name will be concealed but the fact that there is a lock will still be noted: we will see how this goes.

IRONWILL can now be targeted at other players. In the case where you target it at the person you have lifebonded it will be the same delay as when targeting it at yourself: in all other cases the channel is twice as long.
LINK can no longer be forced.
SHATTER has had its damage vs players halved.
IMPRINT now takes a list argument to see where you have left your imprints lying around.
You may now PSI TRANSCEND <psionics skill> to perform a skill only if your transcendence is maxed.

Puppetry.text: FASHION now only requires one unbroken arm.
New addition to STATUS: PUPPET SUMMARY.
SLOW now has a delay on the speed being stripped. This should always happen before you recover balance if you are the one doing the stripping of the speed.
PUNCTURE now correctly masks its anorexia to serverside curing.
FASHION will now respect your active class when determining whether you already possess a puppet or doll of a player.

OBLITERATE can now be unlocked via a new quest. This lasts for 24 hours and may only be performed once per Achaean year as a balancing factor. You should begin your search for said quest in the UNDERWORLD.
Puppets have had their WOOD cost reduced from 2 to 1.

Reclamation.text: EMBRACE now requires your room be reclaimed by you - being adjacent to a reclaimed room is no longer sufficient.
Network effects will no longer persist through entering the editor, DRAGONFORMing, or PREVAILing.
You may now utilise the SMOTHER ability to expand your network while firefighting. See the abfile for details.
Network wide SMOTHER now indicates how many fires were put out to the caster.
CONSTRICT has been reworked. See the abfile for details.
CONSTRICT now blocks the activation of DRAGONFLEX and VOICECRAFT DWINNU.

Riding.text: If auto dismounting when tumbling due to BREAKFALL, your mount will now follow you when this occurs. This means the mount will follow you on tumble completion if you possess the ARTEFACT LEADROPE.
Like the ORDER command, VAULT and MOUNT now default to a loyal denizen before non loyal ones if possible.

Runelore.text: Significantly reduced the willpower cost of EMPOWERing runic items.
It is now possible to EMPOWER CLOTH ARMOUR.
There is now a ten second cooldown between messages from SMUDGING EMPOWERED totems.
You can no longer STAND TOTEMs in artefact tents.
You can now SKETCH runes on the ground while mounted.
All runeblade effects excluding HUGALAZ are now more likely to fire for two handed weapons.
ISAZ has undergone some alterations. See the ability file for details.
NAUTHIZ has undergone some alterations. See the ability file for details.
New ability: ADAPT.
New ability: BISECT.
New ability: CONFIGURATION. This is a very significant change, see the ability file for details.
PITHAKHAN now always fires when striking a target with a DAMAGED HEAD.
TIWAZ has undergone some alterations. See the ability file for details.
BISECT has had its instakill health requirement threshold reduced from 25% to 20%.

ISAZ has had its balance knock on hindering an escape reduced. Its still a little more than other room hinders due to it being inferior in several ways, but  its less stark a difference than it was previously.
WUNJO has had its condition to become attuned from unblind and no insulation to just having the target afflicted with shivering.
WUNJO now scales its damage based on the number of cracked ribs the target has rather than frozen and shivering. The potential damage is higher now, though baseline may appear lower.
KENA now attunes below twenty percent of mana rather than ten.
ISAZ enhanced ENGAGE no longer is stopped by being paralysed or similar.
FEHU now gives two levels of sleep and can strip the KOLA defence.

ADAPT now only comes into play if the weapons you are switching between have different configurations. If the configurations are identical, then switching is now free and the configuration is immediately active.
Fixed a bug letting people sidestep ADAPT with particular wield syntaxes.

Sagas.text: ENDBRINGER now resolves faster against a target with more than a single stack of the CRESCENDO afflictions. The more stacks, the faster the resolution.
The OURANIA talisman now applies to VERTANI in all cases.
VERTANI now bypasses the indoors check if you are in an adjacent room to the target.

ACCORD now has a 33% chance to make a configured ally be counted as unallied in addition to its previous affect on any given check. This was changed from the proposal in the classlead report (make anyone have a chance to be considered an ally) to both be more thematic to the nature of the ability and to avoid problematic interactions with empress tarot and similar.
The silence effect of SNOWSTEARS has been made longer (six seconds to ten).

Sculpting.text: Slightly reduced the flat damage component of POWDERISE health damage.
The penalty for Titan fading has been adjusted down slightly.
CRUNCH and PULVERISE can no longer build shaping against player loyals.
JUGGERNAUT will now disrupt all propped totems in a location upon entering.

TITAN has had its duration increased and cooldown reduced (up to 20 seconds and 7 minutes respectively). The relevant artefact still adds 5 seconds to the duration and knocks 3 minutes off the cooldown.
POWDERISE against a leg will now only prone is at max shaping.
POWDERISE against the head has had its stun scaling tweaked down a little at higher shaping levels.
BURY has had its damage type changed to UNBLOCKABLE.
BURY now increases its damage on each consecutive use on the same target, presuming it comes within a short window of another BURY. This caps at around 50% of maximum health.
New ability: BELLOW.
New ability: LEAP.
The issue where POWDERISE was still proning in all cases when targeted at the left leg has been fixed.
Earth elemental lords can now DIG in digsites without a shovel.
POWDERISE has been slowed down.
POWDERISE has had its damage increased to keep dps the same given the slowdown. This has slightly increased burst potential.
POWDERISE now does 25% more limb damage.
QUAKE can now be enhanced at two momentum rather than at four.
POWDERISE has been sped up.
New ability: MAGNETRISE.
TITANS are now immune to being afflicted with paralysis. Tremble.

The UNYIELDING STONE artefact power has been changed. It no longer conveys a 10% limb damage bonus to all attacks: rather, it conveys a 20% damage to all attacks not aimed at the legs. This functionally pushes POWDERISE into a four hit break against non leg-based limbs while keeping legs at five.

Seafaring.text: SHIP EQUIPMENT has been added. This will display ship equipment and artefacts present on the ship, and which room they are located in.
SHIP WEAPON STATUS has been reformatted.
The victim of a PLUNDER will now see a log of this plundering on the ship's SHIPLOG. This will only state the plundering happened, not what or how much was lost.
WAR GALLIES rate of leakage is no longer set far higher than other ships. This might require further adjustments.
The SHIELD seaspell now scales up in cost by 200 for each use in the last minute. Note that each use resets the minute timer and this caps at an additional 800 cost (on top of the base value).
WAVESCYTHE has had its range significantly increased.
BRIBE is now halved in cost if performed by a CHAMPION, an ASSASSIN, or against someone you have an active CITY BOUNTY against.
SHIPWARNING no longer informs you of information while PHASED.

Shadowmancy.text: MANIFESTED CLOAKS may now be made nondecay through the customisation system.

STRIKE now requires you to append KNEEL or PRONE to the command to gain the proning functionality. If you strike without the prone modifier against an unshielded opponent, they will not be proned and the balance lost you'll suffer will be reduced.
The PARASITE affliction now extends the SPEED defence raising time by 2 seconds.
REAP and CULL damage now scale off of strength against denizens.

You may now change the ATTUNEMENT of a target's shadow by simply attempting to ATTUNE the new type. This only works if you were the last person to attune the shadow: you cannot change the attunement of a shadow someone else instigated. Essentially, if you can't UNATTUNE it, you can't change the attunement in this manner.
VORTEX now respects balance and prone statuses, in line with other beckons.
ARTEFACT PHYLACTERIES now add a chance for the shadow not to fade when utilising SHADOW STEP.
REDEEM now only wipes the shadow some of the time. If you possess the artefact phylactery, this chance is reduced to 0.
TIMELOOP will only boost instills if the instill user was the one to deliver the timeloop affliction.
When MANIFESTing a weapon, you may now additionally specify the hand it should appear in by appending LEFT/RIGHT.
STRIKE now advances an active ATTUNE on a target by one second when it strips a shield. If there is only one second left on the timer, it will not be advanced.
REAP now includes the scythe in the attack lines.
Raised the PVE damage modifier for scythe attacks.
CULL has had its balance cost increased.
STRIKE now advances the attune timer by 3 seconds rather than 1.
Depthswalkers now inately see in the dark for... obvious reasons.
STRIKE with the KNEEL modifier is now much faster when the target also has TIMELOOP.
ASSIMILATE has had its balance reduced from 2.6 seconds to 1.8 seconds.

I've rolled back the timeloop cures after x ticks change. Upon review, this really hasn't worked out how I'd hoped so I think its just a case of square peg round hole and trying to make it work isn't the right direction.
The mana drain at three and up of the core depthswalker afflictions for the RETRIBUTION capstone has been increased.

Shikudo.text: KURO now does the same amount of limb damage as FLASHHEEL. To be specific: KURO is the attack that has had its limb damage changed.
LIVESTRIKE added to the MAELSTROM form.
NEEDLE health damage reduced.
NEEDLE sped up.
New staff attack JINZUKU added to the MAELSTROM form.
Slightly reduced the flat component of the health damage given by RISINGKICK.
You can no longer ADOPT <form> when off balance - this was never intended.
HIRU no longer gives blackout if prone, it rather has a chance to give confusion.
KURO has had its guaranteed lethargy kata requirement raised from 6 to 11.
RUKU has had its limb damage changed to be equivalent to FRONTKICK.
FRONTKICK now shows which side is being attacked in the various messages.
CRESCENT against a prone target will now put you immediately into TYKONOS FORM following the attack. This occurs whether it succeeds or not.
FRONTKICK now respects BALANCING.
The deathsight for CRESCENT now fires correctly.
LIVESTRIKE now delivers its stun at a kata of 9 actions or longer, rather than at 6.
Slightly reduced flat health damage components on various attacks, to make the damage less oppressive against low max health targets.
Slightly reduced the health damage modifier on OAK FORM.
You can no longer build kata when attacking loyals of a player.
FRONTKICK now respects mounted - so frontkick dismounts, if not mounted frontkick will prone.
In light of the above, the limitation that kata would not build against loyal mobs has been reverted.

KATA now decays if no kata form is performed for some time. Each form resets this timer. This timer is fairly long currently as the intent is more to stop people moving around with prepared kata rather than to cause mid fight resets (20 seconds).
SPINKICK will now immediately mangle the head of a prone opponent with a level 1 head break.
SPINKICK damage now ignores shield of absorption against a prone target, in line with similar abilities.
JINZUKU has been added to the GAITAL form.
New ability: DAWNKICK.
The second and third attacks of a combo are now immune to clumsiness if they are different to the first attack of the combo.
You can now append TRANSITION <form> to a combo command to perform the transition inline post attack resolution.

Shindo.text: There is now a line on the look output showing whether someone has the AUGMENT defence active.
MEDITATE's cooldown now persists through logout and shows up on the COOLDOWNS output.
VITIATE now has a chance to block regeneration ticks while active. Note this is purely level-based regen, it doesn't impact skills or external regeneration sources.
For a short time (around half a minute) following a successful PHOENIX, shin generation for that blademaster is halved.
New abilityPERFECTION. This is a highly experimental addition to their group power: we will see how it works in practice then evaluate where they stand in groups again.
PERFECTION has seen significant upgrades. It is now more likely to fire in general, and many of the things that blocked it before no longer do (notably, this includes PARALYSIS).
ANNIHILATION can now throw people who are off balance/equilibrium. It still respects various hinders, and this has been cleaned up to not show them still being thrown when they've not been.
DETECT now supports the SPHINX artefact power.
BURST now does more damage/bleed against someone with a damaged head. This does stack with the prone bonus but has diminishing returns.

Skirmishing.text: WRENCH now does more damage based on the target's bleeding. This only takes affect once the target is bleeding 100 or more.
SKULLBASH will no longer run into the prone burst damage cooldown when used in a solo setting.
TRIP has had its damage (limb and health) formulas changed. It now does half as much as a standard spear attack.
TRIP now incurs a short balance cost if used against someone already prone.
You may no longer SAY while PETRIFIED. This includes for RIDE HOME, DUANATHAR, and other such say-triggered escapes.
GOUGE now delivers WEARINESS instead of SENSITIVITY.
HAEMOPHILIA now functions as parry bypass for SPEAR attacks.
There is now a message to the attacker when their DOUBLESTRIKE delivers EPILEPSY.
TRIP now bypasses parry when the target is afflicted with HAEMOPHILIA.
The balance of WRENCH has been increased slightly - I did not correctly factor nimble into the equation when initially setting this.
WRENCH has had a marginal balance reduction so that the two leg double wrench is more consistent - some timer variation was causing this to sometimes fail at the old value.
RATTLE will now gain a bonus to its formula when in a window following a SKULLBASH, to offset the DISMEMBER downgrades that occurred as a result of the transfix changes.
TRIP has had its limb damage slightly increased.
You may no longer DRAG people into cities they are enemied to.
THRUST has had its limb damage raised relative to other spear attacks.
TRIP now delivers a venom when it successfully prones someone.
WRENCH now delivers a venom along with its current effect.
You can now inline venoms on TRIP. TRIP <target> <LEFT.
You can now inline venoms on WRENCH. WRENCH [venom.
SCYTHE has been made better. See the abfile for details.
TRIP now determines limb damage based on weapon damage.

SKULLBASH damage reduced slightly. I am happy to revisit this and make more changes if its still too good for the investment, but I'm conscious we're making a fair few changes to sentinel here and don't want to muddy the waters too much.

Spiritlore.text: ARAYAN now has a 1 minute cooldown. I am considering further adjustments here, but the chain resurrection is the problem this change aims to solve.
BLOODLET is now a flat bleeding amount to be more in line with the mechanics of CURSES INFLAME.
ARAYAN has had its cooldown increased to 7 minutes, up from 1.
TARNEL now has a chance to go on cooldown for 30 seconds when used. This replaces the old functionality where the binding could break on use.
AELKESH has had its reduction of willpower cost on the bleed curse increased when attuned.
SYVIS now tells you when the affliction relapses on your target.

The mana cutoff for fashions on MALIGUS has been raised and the amount of mana they must be missing per fashion to be gained has been reduced. As a consequence, the number of fashions gained if manaleech is present has been significantly increased to make this a more worthwhile time investment.
Shamanic totems now give entangled similar to regular totems. They now also give paralysis.
The passive resists conveyed by attuning spirits have all been increased to more sane levels.
PROJECT has had its balance time reduced.
PROJECT has had its cooldown reduced from 30 seconds to 20 seconds.
PROJECT from the Aelkesh spirit has had its mana cost reduced, its balance is now 2.5 seconds base and the cooldown has been reduced from 20 seconds to 15.
JUDGEMENT has had its damage reduced a little, but now has a stun effect.
New ability: KHENTIMEN. Some lore suspicions likely confirmed with this one...

Spirituality.text: ANGEL AURA now has a shorter equilibrium when used on someone other than yourself.
ANGEL SAP now does mana drain scaling to affliction count rather than a flat amount.
You may now specify the aff from the CHASTEN BODY or standard pool. Note that you cannot specify the special affs (justice/impatience): those must be accessed via the previous method.
Afflictions from allies no longer have reduced scaling for the purposes of ANGEL SAP.
INQUISITION now boosts ANGEL SAP similarly to disrupts (but to a somewhat greater extent).
Reduced how much power an angel must be on to be summoned from 15 to 5% of its maximum.
ANGEL CARE is now a consistent ten second tick.
CHASTEN no longer consumes equilibrium when following a SMITE or SMASH.
SMASH has had its balance cost changed.
SPIRITUAL MACES have had their stats adjusted. Level three remains unchanged, but unartefacted through to level two are now faster than previously.
SPIRITWRACK has been removed for the time being.
Smite damage (limb and health) have undergone major formula changes.
Targeted SEAR now gives sensitivity if the target is already ablaze. It also does some fire damage in this situation.
The JUDGE lines have changed.
The final affliction on CHASTEN BODY has been changed from justice to manaleech.
A monolith sigil will now prevent the initiation of ANGEL REFUGE, but not the completion.
ANGEL REFUGE has been slightly sped up.
New ability: LIFT.
Current ANGEL POWER is now displayed in gmcp for priests. This will likely require you to have summoned your angel at least once in your history for it to appear, for those being pedantic.
ANGELS now inform their priest when they fade due to passive drain (if said priest is online).
HERESEY has had its duration increased from 3 minutes to 4. The INSPIRED artefact power now doubles this to 8 minutes along with its existing effect.
JUDGEMENT is now two seconds faster against a target afflicted with justice upon its initiation.
ANGEL PUSH now requires the target have either INQUISITION + ABLAZE or TWO BROKEN LEGS to prone.
STUPIDITY has been removed from chasten.
ANGEL TRACE now fires on a tick rather than on movement. It doesn't fire if they haven't moved, so you won't get constantly spammed out.

JUDGEMENT now lets you cleanse someone of enlightenment. Naturally, they still die, but the Occultist will not get credit. Judging in this way bypasses situations where you otherwise would be immune to judgement.
ANGEL PUSH can now be cast with no required conditions when used standalone.
ANGEL PUSH now only requires INQUISITION be present to prone when comboed with a SMITE, rather than both ABLAZE and INQUISITION.
SMITE limb damage has been reduced.
Standalone ANGEL PUSH has been sped up slightly.
JUDGE no longer requires a mace to be wielded, given the new theme of it.
ANGEL CARE is now a twelve second cooldown, up from ten.

CHASTEN BODY capstone changed from manaleech to addiction. In practice manaleech very rarely saw play and this should add an alternative route that may be worth building towards with chasten body in its place that doesn't double down on the already very strong options for priest's primary route.
SMITE limb damage has been increased.

Striking.text: AIRFIST is now 100% PARRY bypass as it is already with GUARDING.
AIRFIST shin cost raised from 15 to 20.
Shin generation is halved when striking a VOIDFISTED opponent.
VOIDFIST has had its duration brought in line with other elemental fist attacks.
VOIDFIST no longer clears upon being impaled.
VOIDFIST now causes strikes to deal some mana damage on successfully landing: this replaces the old functionality.
Inline strikes will function under retardation to bring blademaster in line with similar combo classes.

You may now append a strike to a twoarts slash to perform them both in one command. For example: LEGSLASH LUCAINE LEFT STERNUM. The old functionality remains, for instances where you wish to delay a strike slightly.
DEATHSTRIKE now cancels tumble and prones on the second stage if the target has two broken arms at the time it occurs.

Elemental fists can now be used to replace another elemental fist. They cannot be used to refresh the timer of their own type. I.e. ice could replace void, but ice could not be used on someone who already has ice.

The curing aspect of FLAMEFIST has been increased quite substantially. In practice this is not an issue in one on one combat for the blademaster, so I am giving it a way to be used as an ally support tool with an opportunity cost.
AIRFIST is now learned much earlier in the skill.
DEATHSTRIKE now can be initiated against a shielded/prismaticed target.
All strikes that you wish to be balance free must now be INLINE. Delayed strike is dead.

Sublimation.text: PROBABILITY now has a third person message when it strips a starburst.
ERUPTION is now much faster to complete when overdrawn, though the damage is slightly reduced to account for this.

ERUPTION now will not let you cast it against the same target if one is already coming, to avoid you constantly ruining your timer. You can cast it against a different target to restart the process, in the event your initial target leaves or similar.
THERMAL has been sped up.

RESIDUAL's phlegmatic effect now factors the number of stacks of the other three humours into the calculation. Essentially this means bleeding will boost the effect, and so will having more of other humours stacked.
SPATIAL now includes the caster's room in the effect when used via OVERDRAWing.
The shop of wonders ANKH now blocks IDENTITY, the same as CHAMELEON tattoos.
PROBABILITY works properly now.
SOLAR and SENSITIVITY bonuses previously did not stack. They still don't stack in the traditional sense, but when both are present the sensitive bonus is increased more than normal (33% to 40%).
ERRUPTION now shows the ground trembling in the target's room rather than the casters.
ERUPTION no longer has arcaic requirements you be in the same area. I'm not sure who thought that was a good idea.

RADIATION now shows the caster in the area wide message that is shown to people when radiation begins in a different room or at a different elevation. Naturally, the standard initiation message already has this for the same room/same elevation case so has not been changed.
Rooms under the SPATIAL effect disable monoliths for the purposes of ALCHEMY DISPLACE. Note that any alchemist can make use of this effect while its down, not just ones with access to Sublimation.
RESIDUAL's phlegmatic effect has been reworked. See the abfile for details.
FLASHSTEP now incurs a short balance cost upon resolving successfully.
Switching alchemist third skill now incurs a balance (in preparation for a spec switch artefact, that will be in an announce post).
RESIDUAL SANGUINE now has saner diminishing returns at high stacks like other humours.
NOCTURNE now becomes unhinderable after the second message. Stop it early or its happening.
Small change on the second NOCTURNE 3p message.
The MASTER_OF_SCIENCE artefact power now cuts the RESIGN cooldown to one hour from twenty four, in addition to its previous functionality.

Subterfuge.text: PINSHOT has had its fire rate increased slightly, to bring it in line with other room hinders.
The COLOURS ability is now learned much earlier in the skill.
You may now summon your snake while off balance, though this incurs a longer equilibrium cost.
PINSHOT now does some cutting damage.
WORM CANCEL now has saner limitations on non valid inputs and is more in line with similar channels.
GARROTE now does more damage against a target afflicted with ASTHMA.
GARROTE will now hit in more circumstances where the target is afflicted with physical afflictions.
EVADE now has a somewhat longer balance if the serpent is not hidden. If hidden, it remains as before.
The maximum reduction in balance which can be achieved for the FLAY ability through dex is now less substantial.
New ability: DISTRACTION. Highly experimental, we'll see how this goes.
When you EVADE from a room, all of your pinshots will be yanked loose of your happless victims.
LAPSING CONSCIOUSNESS is now a valid condition for  BIND.
APPRAISE now incurs a short equilibrium if you appraise someone with a bell tattoo.
The whitelist of commands for BASK is now more consistent with other similar skills (you can do a fair bit more now while basking).
AIM now incurs a balance rather than a channel, so its less ping dependent and you can use it with the queueing system.
NOOSE damage massively increased (around double). This should now actually be fatal if caught with it.
PINSHOT balance time reduced when performed from hiding (so the first pinshot balance is faster when ambushing etc).

Survival.text: CLOTs willpower cost has been reduced.

You can now SUPPRESS REVERBERATION <direction> to suppress a reverberation vibration from adjacent. This carries the same limitations as suppressing in room (no magi present unless said room is disrupted by a cube sigil previously), and carries a slightly longer channel.
DEATH has been added to the list of more nitch instakills that bypass STARBURST.
DEATH tarot now gives a layer of freeze when you RUB it on someone, though can only chill them up to shivering.
HERETIC has been added to Occultist tarot.
When you RUB death, you gain an additional rub for each condition you meet from: paralysed, aeon, entangled, stunned.

Swashbuckling.text: DEATHFROMABOVE now does increased damage against a target that is already prone.
ENVENOM is now learned earlier in the skill.

HEARTSFURY has been repurposed. It now boosts the defensive power of tune vs denizens. I'm aware this is a pretty significant nerf, but I don't feel we can reasonably keep it as it is or add more passive pressure to bard with an offensive rework.
STANCES no longer fall on movement/prone.
The HEARTSFURY stance now conveys a chance to bypass all room hinders. This does not apply to elevation changes, just to standard movement.
HEARTSFURY has had its success rate reduced slightly.

Tailoring.text: SEW now pulls the necessary commodities from your rift.

Talismans.text: Adjusted the ATLATL damage formula a little to provide some more survival leeway from stacking atlatls.

Tarot.text: AGORAPHOBIA and CLAUSTROPHOBIA have been added to the list of afflictions deliverable with MOON tarot. Note that this only applies to the list of afflictions specifiable, they are not in the pool of afflictions that may be given randomly.
You will now see the location that someone TOUCHes upon a UNIVERSE map.
The AEON affliction duration given by the AEON tarot has had its duration increased from 17 seconds to 20.
ACTIVATE HERMIT will now pick an unset hermit in your inventory if possible. If all of the hermits in your inventory are set already, it will pick the first one it finds as previously.
AEON now has a delay on the speed being stripped. This should always happen before you recover balance if you are the one doing the stripping of the speed.
The HERMITS output now shows the tag for a hermit if set.

You may now ACTIVATE HERMIT <tag> to tag a hermit card with a specific tag. You may then FLING HERMIT AT GROUND <tag> to specify that hermit in particular. This does not interfere with the old hermit syntax/useage - that still works the same.

The UNIVERSE now has some Meropis locations. As a consequence, this ability has been rewritten from scratch and is now self documenting. You may UNIVERSE LIST to see currently available universe locations. For example, UNIVERSE LIST will only show you the Meropis locations when on Meropis, as these are the only ones accessible from that continent.
TOWER no longer doubles up rubble on directions that already have rubble.
The DEVIL will no longer trigger AEON off of another AEON fling, given this is now  useless.

We've made some changes to how we handle some ability files internally, which has made the RUINATE information much saner. Ruinate details are now visible in the relevant ability files once the RUINATE ability is unlocked. The giant abfile has been slain.

LUST has undergone a major internal rework in preparation for serverside curing support. If you notice anything odd, please message me. Your old lusts should all be converted over, so no need to get re-lusted.
DEATH has had shivering added to the list of conditions which can generate a bonus charge.
RUINATE JUSTICE has had the bonus freeze threshold reduced from five afflictions to four.
RUINATE CREATOR is no longer a channel, but still has a delay.

The dreaded RUINATE WHEEL AEON is no more. It now blacks out instead. This might be fairly lackluster now, but I think will have some more value once the other reports go in this round (note: message change on wheel final stage, just be aware).

Tattoos.text: You can now RELAX BOAR, MOON, MOSS, MEGALITH, and OX tattoos to disable them.
Ticking tattoos now become automatically active upon inking completion.
The extra tattoo slots unlocked by learning tattoos are now tied to explicit abilities in the skill
TALON can now pull people out of Nicator's Keep from the room just outside. The champion is excluded from this, however (this is the person who actually owns the staff, not who is holding it).

TALON used on someone in a bed at the time of initiation now moves that person to the room outside that bed and incurs a 6 second balance knock. The talon is not wiped in this case, and it requires the person was in the bed both at initiation and termination for this result. If you find a way to work around this, please report it.
More talon additions: talons can now pull people out of mines (from directly outside the relevant mine) or from the glade of isolation (from outside the cave, the same as Nirvana and the Inferno).
TALON can now pull people out of the TALISMAN KNOCKER rooms from outside the cave.
WEB now has a miss rate for subsequen casts on the same player, similar to hangedman. Applies everywhere a buckawns would (so bombs thrown in room, but not bombs handed off).
All tattoos that tick passively now have fifty guaranteed ticks of working before the random fade chance can occur.

Tekura.text: BEAR STANCE now only functions against targets at the same elevation as you.

Letting tekura monks add a bit more diversity, they now have access to TRIP BLOCK after completing a quest on JUDGEMENT MOUNTAIN. This is mutually exclusive with EVADE BLOCK now as a balancing factor, however.
There is now a very short stun to a target when a tekura attack breaks a limb against them while they are PRONE.
ROUNDHOUSE now breaks prismatic barriers when in RAT stance.
ROUNDHOUSE now prones when it breaks a shield/prismatic barrier against a target who also has a damaged torso (mild or serious trauma).
The balance penalty on RAT stance has been removed.
CAT stance has had its speed penalty removed.
Tekura punches have had their base accuracy increased.
The COMBO command now supports JUMPKICK better. See the abfile for details.
The duration on SCRAMBLED BRAINS given by SLAM has been reduced. Unusually, this nerf is in fact a buff and should make the throw much more useful now.
BLOCK has been added to the skill.

Knuckles artefacts were previously only applying to the flat portion of attack damage, which in the age of much higher health totals was fairly mediocre. They are now brought into line with other artefacts and apply to the percentage part of the attack as well. This is a nontrivial increase to artefacted tekura output.
PSA: I looked at armbands for accuracy purposes and these are very good, no changes needed.
Tekura damage has undergone some major revisions. In general, tekura damage (both limb and health) has gone up slightly.

Telepathy.text: MIND CRUSH can now be used against denizens. Naturally, this is in room only. It is also hindered by paralysis and other such limitors, because the Sidhe court will not be so simply overcome.
CRUSH ranged has had its range increased from 3 rooms to 5 (or in line of sight).
SCYTHE no longer requires a mindlock if in the target's room.
MIND CRUSH vs denizens should now scale with magic-relevant stats/artefacts.

BARRIER now drops on each stage of radiance. To be specific: if player A is radiancing player B and player C has a mind barrier on player A, each tick of the radiance player A is performing will cause the barrier player C is maintaining to be removed.
MIND COMMAND can no longer be performed while paralysed.
MIND SENSE now has an internal cooldown. Still balance/equilibrium free.
MIND SENSE can now take up to five targets. MIND SENSE <p1> [p2] [...p5].
Custom emotes are now suppressed to witnessers under MIND ISOLATE.
RADIANCE eq cost increased from four seconds to twenty. That is not a typo.

Terminus.text: Serverside curing should now correctly respect various balances when attempting to put up terminus defences.
Significantly reduced the cooldown on using LAIAD.
BOORETH given hatred affliction duration down from 15 seconds to 10.
The mysterious case of LITANY only being cancelled by hinders at the end of the channel when the depthswalker also possessed the shield defence has been fixed. Don't ask.
TOOROS has had its damage decreased.
BAHAR and HAER'BAIN have been switched in the ENVIRONMENTAL research tree.

There is now an internal per target cooldown on being hit with a TOOROS word. This is entirely aimed at reducing what is intended as limited burst potential in teams, the cooldown is not long enough to influence back to back tooros from a single caster. (Basically, for the purposes of one v one combat, you can ignore this change.)
LITANY now accepts a delay between 4 and 10 seconds before it'll trigger the forcing of the actions.
LITANY now has a per target cooldown of 30 seconds. There is no cooldown on the ability itself.
LITANY now requires a two way exit.
As a consequence, you can now FULCRUM GO as well as GO FULCRUM just for convenience.

Traits.text: MASTER CRAFTER now also applies to COOKING and JEWELLERY.
EXPERT DIAGNOSER now requires and consumes balance( around 2 seconds). I have enabled free trait switching for the next 24 hours so you can fix your traits if desired.

Twoarts.text: All sword attacks should now only require one arm to be unbroken to perform.
DISCERN may no longer be used when paralysed.
INFUSE ICE damage vs frozen targets has been reduced.
There is now a message to the blademaster when an ice-infused sword attack strikes a frozen opponent.
POMMELSTRIKE no longer extends VOIDFIST duration.
A STRIKING STRIKE must come somewhat soon after a Two Arts slash. It can no longer come right before you would regain balance.
DISCERN now has messages for every 100 bleeding threshold up to 1000. This includes all classes with access to DISCERN.
RETALIATIONSTRIKE will now have a higher chance of firing when in the THYR stance.
Increased the accuracy on ARM, LEG, and CENTRE SLASHES.
More tweaks to blademaster accuracy to bring this up to par with other classes.
ARASH has had its penalty vs denizen-sourced damage reduced.
ARASH no longer makes you take more damage vs denizens than vs players.
INFUSEEARTH has been added to the skill.
You will now automatically sheathe your blade upon an impale ending (this should happen in all cases, but if you encounter an obscure one where it does not occur, please file a bug report).
MULTISLASH now bypasses the shield of absorption and similar against a prone target.
In addition, clotting under INTERNAL BLEEDING is now unmodified mana drain (the willpower drain is still modifiable).

MAJOR CHANGE: INTERNAL BLEEDING, the affliction given by IMPALESLASH is now a restoration cure to torso that cures at the bottom of said cure stack always (so below internal trauma and heartseed). It is no longer a timed cure.
DRAWSLASH limb damage no longer scales to max health.
Weariness has been added to INFUSEFIRE. Originally I was going to remove the ablaze, but I think this still has value and its not overly strong given the other constraints in play.

Venom.text: The LIGHTWALL modifier on darkshade now scales down as the darkshade stage increases. Essentially it ramps quickly initially, slows down as it approaches the paralysis tick stage, then slows down further while paralysis is ticking passively. (TLDR: darkshade kills you slower under lightwall now).
Causes impulses to relapse if used when they have said affliction (think similar to scytherus, but for the impulse part of the combo).

Functionally, this gives you a list of options. Each option has a set of conditions, a trigger, and a result. If you bite with the trigger venom when all conditions are true, the result happens. Ekanelia results relapse under the scytherus venom.
Is a major negative poison resist debuff.
Impatience EKANELIA now requires weariness in addition to previous requirements.
FRATRICIDE has been moved from a ginseng cure to a lobelia one.

EKANELIA has had support added for consuming an affliction from the conditional list upon its firing. This is to facilitate making the big ticket hits less of a downward spiral you can't really hope to get out of once it gets going. This will all show up under EKANELIA CONSIDER, similar to bonuses.
The CURARE ekanelia (causing hypochondria) now consumes the hypersomnia. This should make curing decisions matter more in the closing phase.
A new ekanelia has been added ([ACONITE] requiring DEADENING + DEMENTIA = PARANOIA). Essentially better focus lock support.
Resolved various bugs surrounding scytherus combined with ekanelia.
SHRUGGING can now be processed inline (i.e. DSTAB MAKARIOS CURARE KALMIA SHRUGGING).
SHRUGGING has had its cooldown reduced from thirteen seconds to ten.
SHRUGGING is moved into a comboable active (so happens post dstab not pre) and incurs an equilibrium.

Vision.text: The equilibrium cost of DEATHSIGHT has been removed. It still requires you be on equilibrium to activate, however.
RECOGNITION is now learned very early in the skill.

SQUINT now has an internal cooldown when trying to squint in multiple directions rapidly. For example, if you SQUINT EAST, you can keep squinting east but there will be a short delay before you can SQUINT NORTH. This also applies to WHO <direction>.
SQUINT's cooldowns no longer apply when recent PVP aggression hasn't taken place.
Oddities with the SQUINT cooldowns not being applied correctly have been resolved.
SEARCH has had its balance cost reduced.

Vodun.text: FASHION now only requires one unbroken arm.
MANGLE when used on a damaged limb by a SHAMAN will now raise the limb to mangled rather than doing nothing.
New addition to STATUS: VODUN SUMMARY.
SLOW now has a delay on the speed being stripped. This should always happen before you recover balance if you are the one doing the stripping of the speed.
FASHION will now respect your active class when determining whether you already possess a puppet or doll of a player.
The fashion decay system has been rewritten, fixing a variety of strange loopholes. This also applies to puppetry.
STATUS now only requires 1 fashion. It now consumes balance if you try to status a puppet/doll of someone while the doll is less than 15 fashions and the target is not in your room.
SUMMON now only bypasses monoliths on people who consider you an ally if you are within standard ranged distances or line of sight.

Voicecraft.text: MAQAM will now give DIZZINESS if the target already has clumsiness when you SING it at them.
LIMERICK and EPIC have been removed from the list of songs that SONGBIRD can cause to happen passively.
SERVERSIDE CURING will no longer attempt to put up ARIA if you are off voice balance or deaf.
CANTATA has now had its voice balance made static. This means it will not scale like other songs.
QASIDA can no longer be triggered by the songbird. If we still need to tone this back, I'll consider removing songbird from being able to fire off of EPIC.

You can no longer THROW things while off voice balance. You can still throw then sing since I'm fine with most of the use cases here, but the ability to have super fast afflicting through rebounding is no more.

Warrior Tert.text: OBSERVE/SCENT now incurs an eq cost.
REPORT no longer shows the loyals room if the loyal is tracking someone - instead it shows the target's current/max health. Report shows the room as previously when the loyal is not tracking.

Weaponmastery.text: (Sword and Board): FEROCITY is no longer a static decay value - it is now based on the balance time of the attack used that generated it. This should fix issues where balance times were longer than the ferocity decay timer.
(Two handed): Made some minor adjustments to the damage formula - this should mostly only affect people at the very low end of health.
SLAUGHTER, DOUBLEWHIRL, WHIRL, and COMBINATION attacks now all scale with strength when targeted at denizens.
(Dual cutting): RAZESLASH now only requires one arm be entirely free.
(Two handed): BRAIN has had its damage formula changed. It has had its damaged increased against target's with damaged/mangled head statuses.
(Two handed): DISCIPLINE has been added to the skill.
(Two handed): OVERWHELM added to the skill.
(Dual blunt): Levels of MOMENTUM without specific messages have had them added.
MOMENTUM and FEROCITY are now sent via gmcp.
(Dual blunt): ASSAULT has been slowed down.
UNDERCUT has had its failure balance penalty reduced slightly.
UNDERCUT has had its limb damage made equivalent to a single slash.
(Dual Blunt): Slightly slowed down SINGLE WHIRL.
(Dual Blunt): ASSAULT TORSO now has a faster balance than ASSAULT HEAD.
(Sword and Board): the damage against denizens has been increased.

(Sword and Shield): the shield portion of combination attacks will no longer rebound from magical shields in the case where you raze rebounding and a magical shield is present. There is far too much shield in this notation.
(Dual Cutting): DSL now functions similar to other attacks in that only the first slash is affected by the CLUMSINESS affliction.
(Two handed): BRAIN when modified by OVERWHELM no longer requires prone. It has also had its scaling on skull fractures altered slightly.
(Sword and Board): Ferocity will no longer be generated while DEDICATION is active. Attacks under DEDICATION will still keep ferocity from decaying if some has been generated before its use.
(Sword and Board): shield attacks are no longer influenced by the clumsiness affliction: only the sword portion of the combination can now miss in this way.
Changing your weaponmastery specialisation now respects the aggression cooldown. This does not apply for newbies or for selecting your specialisation if you do not currently have one set.
(Sword and Board): Sword attacks now respect weaponry targeting if you do not specify a limb in the combination command.
(Two handed): The relevant weapon-based raze skills now handle REFLECTIONS correctly.
COMBINATION now only triggers KAI DELIVERANCE on the first hit to stop it triggering the instakill aspect twice in one command.
(Two Handed): torn tendons no longer stacks with traditional room hinders.
(Dual Blunt): momentum decay is now extended by one second when using purely flails.

(Two handed): CONTINUATION now has a 7 second cooldown and has had its battlefury balance significantly reduced. Functionally you can continuation the same amount as previously, it just won't lock your offense out for so long when you do it.

SHIELDSTRIKE LOW now takes balance if done normally. It acts as previously when done off balance following a weaponmastery combo (essentially meaning shieldstrike low must come post combo rather than before as previously).
Switching specialisation via the artefact insignia has had its times changed. Level 1 is now 12 hours, level 2 is now 1 hour, level 3 is now 1 minute. Still respecting aggression cooldown, naturally.
(Sword and board): DEDICATION now costs 5% of your willpower when it bypasses paralysis in addition to other setbacks.

(Two Handed): BATTLEFURY PRECISION now causes attacks to bypass damage nullification effects such as shields of absorption in addition to previous functionality. Regular hits/battlefury speed boosted hits remain unchanged.
LUNGE, ENGAGE, and ARC now will factor armour/defences and such more sanely.
UNDERCUT will now always break the limb if striking it when above ninety percent damage.
(Two Handed): if you miss with a non speed enhanced strike, the recovery time will be faster. Note this does not apply to rebounding, only due to actual misses.
(Dual blunt): FUROR now counts paralysis as a prone condition.
(Dual blunt): expend arms for flails has become paralysis instead of darkshade.
(Two handed): TORN TENDONS now fire below most other traditional room hinders, to prevent you nerfing your room hinder by accident as two h.
(Sword and Shield): DEDICATION now requires max ferocity and halves your ferocity upon use. The willpower cost has been removed.
(Dual Blunt): ASSAULT TORSO no longer breaks the torso. It now does two fractures against no torso break, three against mild internal trauma, and four against serious internal trauma.
(Dual Blunt): FUROR now does the relevant checks before the whirl combo, not after the attacks start landing.
(Sword and Shield): SMASH HIGH now gives the scrambled brains affliction instead of a focus knock.
(Sword and board): Broadsword slashes now do significantly more limb damage than their longsword counterparts. Health damage remains unchanged.
(Dual Cutting): RAZESLASH now has a negative speed modifier (so its slower, still scales with weapon speed but worse than other attacks).
(Two Handed): OVERWHELM's window of opportunity has been made slightly longer.
(Dual cutting): UNDERCUT can no longer miss if the target has NAUSEA.
(Sword and shield): New ability: ANTICIPATE.

Untargeted ARC damage has been reduced slightly. I don't want to go full on take the eq+untargeted arc nuke away here as I think it still has a place, but it is overperforming currently compared to where I would like it to be. Something I'll be monitoring a bit more closely.

(Relevant specs): DISEMBOWEL has under gone a formula rework. The first 15 str now count a little more towards the calculation, which means you affectively hit the insta threshold with torso a little sooner. Higher strength people should now find that they very rarely miss a disembowel kill with torso damage (if you're passed twenty, they're very dead now where this wasn't always the case).
(Sword and shield): New SHIELD STRIKE: DEFENCES.

(Sword and board): CLUB has had a very slight increase to the stun duration (you likely will not notice it). This was to fix an edge case where the stun could occasionally end a fraction too early and permit a writhe out of the impale where it was not intended to be possible.

(Two handed/dual blunt): members of these specs now perceive when fractures give afflictions in their room (note: when they afflict, not when they tick). The initial hit does not show this message, as this is manifestly apparent from the attack in question already.

Weaponry.text: You can now THROW items while gripping is up.
PARRY no longer requires you have a parrying weapon wielded to gain the defence, only at the time of actually parrying an attack.
Classes that use certain weapons are now not more affected by CLUMSINESS than non weapon users. Classes affected are: Blademaster (all blade attacks), dual cutting knights, and priest (smite).
Inline venoms now work for throwing weapons in a direction.
You can now THROW items with SELFISHNESS active.
WEAPONRY is now attained through leveling, the same as survival. All lessons invested in weaponry skills have been refunded.

Weatherweaving.text: FULMINATION now has a specially coloured message, similar to holocaust.
DISTURB has had its balance cost reduced.
DISTURB will have its balance cost halved for those with the STORMBORN artefact power, in addition to said power's current effect.
FULMINATION can now be summoned at any elevation.
WATERSPOUT no longer requires flood, but does bonus damage if flood is present. There are different messages in the two different cases.
(player targets only): WINDWHIP now does magical cutting damage and has had its damage increased. It bypasses SoA style bonuses natively.
SCRY now supports the SPHINX artefact power.
AERIAL now respects room hinder by default. You may add the OVERCHARGE argument to bypass room hinder for fifteen arcane power.

Weaving.text: UNWEAVE now does damage.
DECAPITATE can now be done with woven weapons if you have a hand free and are not wielding an appropriate weapon in the first place.
MIRIADS now respect divine grace.
FLURRY vs denizens now has a range of damage it can deal.
HAMSTRING has had its limb damage reduced. I'll be monitoring things going forward and adjusting further as necessary.
Slightly increased Psion PVE damage.
SECONDSKIN now conveys some additional resistance to cutting and blunt attacks sourced from denizen damage.
The caster will now be informed who newly created MIRIADS focus upon.
Weaving damage will now use whichever stat is higher between the Psion's inteligence or strength.
MIRIADS will now utilise FLURRY as you would expect.
You may now append INDOMITABLE to your rally to raise this defence as a part of your inspiring cry.
Slightly reduced the raw damage component of weaving attacks vs players (does not apply to flurry).

Prone on UNWEAVE is now more gated. It will always give the prone on unweave spirit still, but only give the prone on the other two in the event that the other is present (so unweave body only prones if they also have unweave mind, etc).
UNWEAVE BODY/MIND can now be cured by actives/passives if no other afflictions are present, similar to humours. In the event both humours and unweavings are present, humours are still cured first.
Weaving attacks have been reworked a little so you just get a clumsy message now, not them hitting you with the attack then the clumsy message. Applies to first/second/third person.
DECONSTRUCT is now immune to clumsiness.
PROJECTION DESTROY is now much faster and no longer a channel (there is still a short delay on the destroy happening).
New prepare: INCISIVE.
People with the weaving skill no longer need to wield a weapon to parry.
SECONDSKIN is no longer strippable.

Woe.text: SLITH no longer has an eq cost.
SLITH now resolves faster against a target with more than a single stack of the CRESCENDO afflictions. The more stacks, the faster the resolution.

Woodlore.text: The LEMMING no longer gives CONFUSION on its passive tick. Instead it gives VERTIGO. The aim here is to reduce PETRIFY pressure a little while also mitigating the major weakness sentinel suffers against those who can fly. We will monitor and make further adjustments as necessary.
LEMMING now targets shield before rebounding when ENRAGEd.

The horrendous ENRAGE system has been reworked. You no longer need an animal summoned to ENRAGE it. We may have to drop the animals you can have out at a time to one in light of this as it removes some of the tradeoffs, but we'll see how things pan out.
ENRAGED BUTTERFLY no longer transfixes or has a prone component. It will unblind if they are blind, and give dizzy if they are not.
Stun is now a passive effect on all axes THROWN at a target, so long as the SENTINEL has learned the RETURNING ability and the target is not ELEUSIAN or ROGUE (i.e. tied to civilisation).

BADGER retains its old effect but has some additions. The bleeding is now slightly increased against someone with HAEMOPHILIA, and the badger will give asthma instead of bleeding if the target has 200 bleeding or more.
BUTTERFLY ENRAGE no longer gives dizziness as part of its effect. This is now strictly an unblind tool.
BUTTERFLY no longer passively gives stupidity - this has been moved to undeaf, as a more damage focussed tool rather than a PETRIFY one.
RAVEN's tick rate has been adjusted, so it is not ticking every other balance.
ENRAGE now indicates when you may enrage again.
You may now ASSEMBLE traps in duels to the death in the arena.
ASSEMBLE has been sped up slightly and also yields one more trap in the better case now (once you've learned high enough in the skill - earlier on you still only generate 2 per assemble).
All of your traps will no longer be wiped when you die in the arena.
LAYing traps has been sped up by 0.2 seconds.

Adjusted the THROW bonus accuracy formula sentinel's receive - I don't anticipate any major changes at the lower end, but it should no longer beat maxed out dodge bonuses in all cases at the upper end all of the time. I'll be monitoring this.

There is now a 25% chance when disarming a trap successfully that you won't get commodities back. This is to fix an issue introduced with making you get more traps per commodities which would let you produce more commodities than you used if you were willing to spend your life assembling/disarming on a loop. On average, you should get the same number of commodities back as you would have before the last lot of classlead updates.
The no summoning forest animals as a forest enemy now actually works. Think of all the missed opportunities.

The RAVEN animal now has a slower consistent tick rather than having a random chance to fire on a much faster tick. Only newly summoned ravens will be impacted by this, so you may want to dismiss any current ones you have out at the time of this posting.
The FOX now does increased bleeding against a target suffering from HAEMOPHILIA.
The WOLF now does increased damage against an UNDEAF target.
ENRAGE BADGER now gives addiction. If the target already has addiction, it gives nausea. It continues to give bleed in both cases, same values as previously.
FIRSTAID now reduces the mana cost of clot (pre impaleslash and similar) as well as its old functionality.
ENRAGE balance has been sped up slightly.

SNARE has been repurposed. It now conveys a timed affliction (20 seconds at present) which caps celerity at one. I'll monitor this, but I prefer it thematically to another stock room hinder for the class.
You can now CALL ANIMALS off balance (but not off equilibrium).
When you lay a SNARE or NOOSE, any SNARE or NOOSE in the opposite direction from the adjoining room is wiped.

You can now LAY traps directly, without preassembling. You can still assemble because this is actually cheaper (In hindsight I recall this is why we did it). Essentially, to illustrate: three rope at trans will get you four snare traps if you assemble. When laying directly, one rope will get you one snare (obviously, since you can't lay more than one). So laying directly is more convenient, but slightly more expensive commodity wise just by its nature.

Zeal.text: Spiritshields now function when the priest isn't in room as they did in the past, though only against denizen sourced attacks. Player attacks still require the priest to be in the target's location to convey the bonus.
The skill has been added.
PURGE now does increased damage against a target with the SPIRITBURN affliction. This affliction is consumed in the process.
There is now an optional argument to permit the delaying of SALVATION, causing the effect to activate two seconds later rather than immediately.
LIGHT cooldown reduced from 30 seconds to 25.
LIGHT moved to a personal cooldown rather than a room one.
GUILT is now learned earlier in the skill.
BURN has been sped up slightly.
GUILT has been sped up slightly.
The previous change to PURGE where spiritburn would be cured for bonus damage has been reverted.
The VERSES now omits verses with no restrictions by default to cut down on information: you can opt in to the full list with VERSES ALL.

Reciting UNFLINCHING will now additionally convey the HERESY defence if it is not present. The duration on this is somewhat reduced compared to activating it standalone, though is also increased by the relevant artefact power.
GUILT will no longer give back the affliction the focus cured.
RECITE balance now incurs an extended duration penalty when reciting prayers in a prone state.
The recite balance of PURGE has been reduced.
New ability: REJECTION. Note that this does make priest's stronger in melee following a protracted ranged battle. This is intentional, but may need adjusting - we'll see.
New ability: PERSEVERE.
REJECTION can no longer be cast in room on people (oops), and definitely not on dead people (?).
Reciting UNFLINCHING no longer can be hindered by WEARINESS like other verses are.
FRAGILITY is no longer consumed when hitting with an untargeted attack.
New ability: ORATION.
New REBUKE: HERESY.
Recite is now hindered by clumsiness instead of weariness. The first person message to the caster has changed in the event of a failure.
Zeal now correctly unmasks the hinder affliction in the event of a failure.
